com.fxcm.messaging
Class ConnectionManagerEx

java.lang.Object
  com.fxcm.messaging.ConnectionManagerEx

public class ConnectionManagerEx
extends Object

ConnectionManagerEx class is a client side singleton manager for communication sessions. It supports multiple sessions within the same client side JVM space.

init

public static void init(Properties aProps)
Initializes based on properties bundle.

Registered properties names:

  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.NoReloginAttempts Number of attempts to restore a connection ( via relogin).
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.ReloginTimeout Timeout between attempts of relogin in ms.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.NoReconnectAttempts Number of attempts to restore a session.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.ReconnectTimeout Timeout between attempts of session restoring in ms.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.BatchSize Maximum number of messages allowed in one retrieval batch.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.PollInterval Interval between of data retrieval in ms.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.ProxyServer Remote proxy server name or IP address.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.ProxyPort Remote proxy server IP port.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.ProxyUserID Remote proxy server login ID.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.ProxyPassword Remote proxy server login password.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.ProxyRealm Remote proxy server realm name.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.ProxyType Remote proxy server type.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.ProxyHTTP11 Forces to use HTTP 1.1 for thru proxy communications.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.TcpTimeout TCP timeout in ms.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.HttpTimeout HTTP timeout in ms.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.AdminMessages Forces to pass administrative messages onto User Session listeners.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.LogLevel Log Level (0 for silent mode and 4 - to enable debug logs.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.LogFile Log file name, reserved for future implementations.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.SecurePreferable Forces to use secure connections.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.AsyncPreferable Forces to use asynchronous connections.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.MessageFlags Set of message flags. See IFixDefs.CHANNEL_* for possible values.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.SyncRequestTimeout Timeout of processing of synchronous requests in ms.
  • com.fxcm.messaging.IConnectionManager.AppInfoApplication Name

Parameters:
aProps - a properties bundle

createUserSession

public static IUserSession createUserSession(String aHostDescriptorURL,
                                             String aHostName,
                                             String aServiceName,
                                             String aLoginID,
                                             String aPassword,
                                             String aStationName)
Creates a new empty user session with remote service by its name and host descriptior.

Parameters:
aHostDescriptorURL - url of remote configuration (xml) file
aHostName - name of the host defined in server configuration file.
aServiceName - name of application service "PriceServer" or "NewsServer"
aLoginID - an user id
aPassword - an user password
aStationName - end user station(application) name
Returns:
user session (not connected)

aLoginID -
aPassword -

aConnectionManager -

createUserSession

public static IUserSession createUserSession(String aHostDescriptorURL,
                                             String aHostName,
                                             String aLoginID,
                                             String aPassword,
                                             String aStationName)
Creates a new empty user session with remote service with host descriptior only.


Simple uses aServiceName = aHostName

Parameters:
aHostDescriptorURL - url of remote configuration (xml) file
aHostName - name of the host defined in server configuration file.
aLoginID - an user id
aPassword - an user password
aStationName - end user station(application) name
Returns:
user session

Returns:
User session object or null if session is not found

Returns:

cleanup

public static void cleanup()
Cleans up Communication Manager.


Drops all active sessions and closes all communication channels and reset static variables
